title: INSANE Amazon Category Change [NEW Rocket Feature]
description:
You can get Rocket here: https://kindlepreneur.com/click/PublisherRocket

If you're confused about the latest changes to Amazon categories, you have come to the right place! 

Amazon is always changing their system and it can be hard to keep up with them. In this video, I’m going to show you 3 secrets to Amazon's new system of categories, and something that will be a game changer for your category efforts going forward. 

Check out my article on selecting Amazon categories here: https://kindlepreneur.com/how-to-choose-the-best-kindle-ebook-kdp-category/
